structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 336, effective January 1, 1975. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Jail time prior to sentence to state institution to be credited against sentence -- How applied.
